name: The Sacred Vessel
description:
My prototype of a visual novel inspired by the pottery repair technique of kintsugi, as well as the philosophy Wabi-Sabi. Made with Fungus on Unity.

This is a beloved project made for a workshop done as part of the video game creation program for UQAT Montréal, under the great supervision of Elise Trinh, Associate Narrative Director for Ubisoft and PhD Candidate!

*Note: The music and some of the textures are not mine. Only the story, sprites and illustrations are.

Thank you to UQAT for an amazing and unforgettable school career!
